channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: How to use AI image tools to explain ideas visually
item.description: Creative prompt-writing techniques to turn AI image tools into fun, powerful systems.

item.title: ‘I can’t actually keep working on a long, manual task like this in the background once a message turn ends’ — ChatGPT has a major limitation that needs to be addressed, and fast
item.description: ChatGPT can appear to handle long, complex jobs, but a hidden limitation means it can’t actually work on tasks once a reply window closes.

item.title: Thanks But No Thanks on the Claudeswarms, Kevin Roose
item.description: The New York Times columnist and Hard Fork podcast co-host might be a little too jazzed about vibecoding.

item.title: Shameful: Tech leaders react to ICE killing of Alex Pretti
item.description: As social media exploded, some tech voices spoke out.

item.title: All the ways TikTok is broken: here’s what’s real and what’s not
item.description: While social media rumors have suggested the errors are examples of censorship, more than a day after the issues began, TikTok USDS says the problems are the result of a power outage at a data center that it is working to resolve. Rumors of censorship targeting anti-ICE protesting or attempting to block discussion of Jeffrey […]
